page.title: 10A Heathylee Mother's Day
page.content:
My mum gets up at about half past seven. When me and my sister have gone to school my mum goes to work at about quarter past nine. She works at a Guest House in Hartington where she does the cleaning and makes all the beds and also serves in the tearoom.
She comes home between half past four and half past five. When she gets home she cooks tea for us. Then we help Mum with the washing up.
Mum then makes the beds (by this time she is sick of making beds!) before sitting down and putting her feet up to watch the television.
My mum goes to bed round about one o'clock.
